sourcesContent:
import Modal from "../UI/Modal"; import { useState } from "react"; const Cart = ({ count, items }) => { const [showCartModal, setShowCartModal] = useState(false); const handleCartModal = () => { setShowCartModal(showCartModal => !showCartModal) } return ( <> {showCartModal &&

Checkout Modal

{ count > 0 ? items.map((item) => {

{item.title}

{item.price} {item.discountedPrice}
{item.quantity}
}) :
Please add something in your cart!
}
{ count > 0 &&

Total Amount:

2000 INR

}
} ) } export default Cart;
